author: Staff Reporter
text:
Free coaching classes for Railway Recruitment Board and bank examinations will commence at the District Employment Office on March 3. The classes will be held from 9.30 a.m. to 5.30 p.m. on week days alone.

Students who wish to take part in the classes can approach the employment office. They can also utilise the competitive book examinations available in the library in the office, a press release said.
title: Free coaching classes
